biography.summary: James Lankford is a Republican U.S. Senator from Oklahoma, serving since 2015. He previously served as U.S. Representative for Oklahoma's 5th congressional district from 2011 to 2015.

contact.office_address: 731 Hart Senate Office Building Washington DC 20510

policy_positions.stance: Supports lower taxes to promote economic growth
Supports school choice and faith-based initiatives

timeline.event: Elected to the U.S. House of Representatives, Oklahoma's 5th district
Elected to the United States Senate
Continues service as a Senior Senator for Oklahoma
